entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RC2: Triggers and MultiBindings do not inherit their parent datatype #25141
  • [iOS] CollectionView Group Header & Footer Templates cause immediate crash on iOS 18 #25139
  • [iOS] Remove new iOS18 Tabs from Catalyst and iPad #25136
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [Android] [Shell] replace navigation leaks current page #25134
  • Windows Build Errors #25132
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Cannot Pair with Mac #25131
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Xaml.Diagnostics.BindingDiagnostics warnings are displayed for a ListView with an ItemTemplate #25128

Closed

  • RC2: XC0022 Excessive and incorrect binding warnings #25138
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly #5669
    Backlog
  • Memory leak in .Net 8 using Entity Framework and Sqllite #25087

PullRequests

Created

  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    do-not-merge
  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25137
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [Testing] Add UITest Stepper actions #25130
    area-testing
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor

Merged

  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨
  • First tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24943
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Adding tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24944
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr9] Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #25121
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Disable TitleViewSetOnShellWorksAfterNavigation on Device Tests #25125
    area-testing

Updated

  • [iOS] Changed UIImageRenderingMode for buttons #25107
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • Move TitleViewSetOnShellWorksAfterNavigation to Appium #25094
    area-testing
  • Fix Regression with iOS button resizing with text or image change #25122
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button, .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #24990
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Permissions (BT & WiFi): don't add AccessFineLocation to required permissions if NeverForLocation flag is present #20874
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for the issue with Label text color when resetting from FormattedText. #25119
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Try build arcade net9 #25085
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Fixed NavigationPage TitleBar visibility issue when set to the parent page #25000
    area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Debug slow controls device tests #25096
    do-not-merge
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    community ✨
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, stale
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Winodws] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
